title: Woman's Headdress, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: embroidered in brick stitch on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: Soft cream panel of creped silk, embroidered at each end in gold thread in a pattern of three large, identical bouquets with crescent leaves, round blooms, and a tulip center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Woman's Headdress, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: embroidered in brick stitch on plain weave. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-39.
